fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have all abilities and attributes of three different random Town roles from https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aXJu1yl1zWI4FLRhamAGCxxVxEFq2Gu5SOi_K6zgL-M/edit in addition to your other abilities.
- Mayor and Jailor can't be among these roles.
- If Vigilante is among these roles, instead, your base attack is upgraded to Powerful.
